title: The Solar System Travel Guide
text: We designed and built a fullstack application in three weeks, applying everything we had learned at Technigo. We worked in an agile way, collaborated through GitHub, and regularly demoed our progress. The stack included React with React Router on the frontend, and Node.js, Express, and MongoDB on the backend, deployed via Netlify and Render. We prioritized accessibility and responsiveness by following WCAG guidelines, created the design in Figma, and tested the API using Postman.

title: Crossfit Mamas - Design handoff
text: Transformed a UX design studentâ€™s handoff into a React-based landing page for a gym/fitness club. This project bridged the gap between UX design and development.

title: The Maze
text: A text-based adventure provided by an API in form of a labyrinth. The goal was to use the API and build an interface that gives the user control over what to do next. Focus was the global state management with Zustand to store the data from the API into the global state.

title: Popular Movies
text: Utilizing themoviedb.org's API to showcase movies and their details. Features include fetching popular movies, rendering movie details, and managing image URLs. Designed with a focus on responsiveness and accessibility. Enhancements include error handling, loading states, and dynamic movie lists.

title: Happy Thoughts
text: A fullstack React project focused on state management and API interactions for fetching and posting data in a feed.

title: Survey - The Science of Happiness
text: A React project to create a customizable survey form. Focus on React state and form control. After submission, users see a summary. Design is flexible but should prioritize accessibility.

title: Weather App
text: A simple weather app that uses a weather API to tell today's weather, city, temp, sunrise/sunset and a 5-day forecast.

title: Library
text: This is a digital library using an array of books, where you can sort the books, filter the books or generate a random one using a button.

title: The Dinosaur Bot
text: This interactive bot is built with JavaScript, HTML and CSS, focusing on DOM manipulation, functions, and JavaScript scope.
